content: bee kind copyright deborah smith 2024 all rights reserved materials worsted weight cotton 60-75 grams size 7 4 5 mm needles 2 stitch markers tapestry needle to weave in ends abbreviations pm = place marker sm = slip marker notes ~directions for the seed stitch border are inside brackets use stitch markers to separate the borders from the design starting with row 6 ~the odd row will be the right side you will begin with a 5 stitch seed stitch border then knit to the last 5 stitches and repeat the border ~the even row will be the wrong side inside the seed stitch borders you ll be creating the design from the back in reverse 🤪 you won t see the design until you look at the front ~hint use a ruler highlighter or highlighter tape to help you follow the even row ~needle tip protectors available at emma s notions at https //www etsy com/ shop/emmasnotions/ etsrc=sdt ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ cast on 49 stitches using a non-stretchy cast on like the cable cast on row 1-5 k1 p1 across to last stitch k1 row 6 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 pm p39 pm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 7 and all odd row through row 63 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm k39 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 8 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm p39 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 10 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm p5 k2 p3 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p3 k2 p2 k6 p6 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 12 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm p5 k2 p2 k2 p3 k2 p2 k2 p3 k2 p2 k2 p3 k2 p5 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1
